original_title: Rossini: Il Barbiere di Siviglia (Théâtre des Champs-Élysées, 2017)
overview: This is Laurent Pelly’s Théâtre des Champs-Élysées staging of Rossini’s Il barbiere di Siviglia, with a cast featuring Florian Sempey as Figaro, Catherine Trottmann as Rosina, and Michele Angelini as Il Conte Almaviva.  Jérémie Rhorer conducts Le Cercle de l-Harmonie.
title: Rossini: Il Barbiere di Siviglia (Théâtre des Champs-Élysées, 2017)
